long_description: Replacement element for Katadyn(R) Hiker Pro water filter. Glass-fiber element is pleated for increased surface area to handle silt and muddy water. Activated-carbon core adsorbs chemicals and pesticides to improve taste of water. Includes field maintenance kit with cleanable filter protector to extend cartridge life in challenging conditions. To clean filter protector, simply swish it in the water. Katadyn Hiker PRO replacement element works with Hiker Pro, Hiker and Base Camp filters as well as older PUR Hiker filters.
short_description: Replacement element for Katadyn(R) Hiker Pro water filter.
